title: Deep learning tool improves accuracy of lung nodule malignancy detection
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) deep learning tool that estimates the malignancy risk of lung nodules achieved high cancer detection rates while significantly reducing false-positive results.

title: YouTube says it has paid creators more than $100 billion since 2021
description: The company also announced new artificial intelligence tools for YouTube Shorts, its short-form vertical video product.
content:
YouTube said on Tuesday it has paid out over $100 billion to creators, artists and media companies since 2021.
The surge has been fueled in part by growing viewership on connected TVs. The number of channels making more than $100,000 from TV screens ... [1356 chars]

title: Dave McCormick: ‘We should be deeply worried’ about China’s AI dominance
description: The Republican senator said the U.S. can beat out China in the artificial intelligence race — but only if it prioritizes investment.
content:
McCormick said he believes the U.S. remains ahead of China in AI development, “but that leadership position is only going to stay there if we continue to invest, we continue to have the best talent in the world focused on it.”
The GOP senator organiz... [627 chars]

title: AI Deals: Saudi Arabia Eyes Artificial Intelligence Partnership With PE Firms
description: Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, is in early-stage talks with global private equity firms on a partnership to plow significant capital into data centers and related infrastructure, people familiar with the matter said.
content:

title: MGX co-invests with Silver Lake in Altera acquisition
description: MGX, an Abu Dhabi artificial intelligence investment firm and partner of Silver Lake, said on Tuesday it has joined the buyout group in acquiring a majority stake in California programmable chip business Altera, leaving Intel with a 49% holding.
content: DUBAI, Sept 16 (Reuters) - MGX, an Abu Dhabi artificial intelligence investment firm and partner of Silver Lake, said on Tuesday it has joined the buyout group in acquiring a majority stake in California programmable chip business Altera, leaving Int... [1321 chars]

title: Google Lays Off Over 200 AI Contractors: Report
description: Tech giant Google has reportedly laid off more than 200 contractors working on its artificial intelligence projects, including Gemini and AI Overviews.
content:
New Delhi:
Tech giant Google has reportedly laid off more than 200 contractors working on its artificial intelligence projects, including Gemini and AI Overviews.
The move has raised concerns over job security, low pay, and possible retaliation again... [2004 chars]

title: Disney, Universal, Warner Bros. Sue Chinese AI Startup MiniMax
description: Walt Disney Co., Comcast Corp.’s Universal Studios and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. are suing Chinese artificial intelligence startup MiniMax, accusing the company of pirating the studios’ intellectual property.
content:

title: Deep learning model estimates cancer risk of lung nodules
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) deep learning tool that estimates the malignancy risk of lung nodules achieved high cancer detection rates while significantly reducing false-positive results. Results of the study, which used data from large, multi-site lung cancer screening trials, were published in Radiology.

title: Workday to acquire Sana for US$1.1 billion
description: Workday said on Tuesday it would acquire artificial intelligence firm Sana for about US$1.1 billion, as the human resources software provider looks to drive demand by integrating artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities into its products.
